join inaugural culture team Manufacturing and Operations Supervisor Banyan Energy Inc Berkeley CA 2011 to 2013 Defined operational systems processes and policies in support of product product development goals and cost reduction milestones Pointman for supply chain and inventory planning responsible for balancing monetary time and risk considerations in order to enable the
